snippet: Gianfranco Rosi’s documentary “Sacro GRA,” the surprise winner last year of the Venice Film Festival’s top prize, is part of the Open Roads: New Italian Cinema festival at the Film Society of Lincoln Center.
abstract: Mike Hale discusses Gianfranco Rosi documentary Sacro GRA, which won top prize at Venice Film Festival and is playing as part of Open Roads: New Italian Cinema Festival at Film Society of Lincoln Center; notes that film focuses on several characters as it examines Grande Raccordo Anulare, circular road that surrounds Rome.
lead_paragraph: Gianfranco Rosi’s documentary “Sacro GRA,” the surprise winner last year of the Venice Film Festival’s top prize, is part of the Open Roads: New Italian Cinema festival at the Film Society of Lincoln Center.

headline.print_headline: Encircling Rome, On and Off the Road
headline.seo: ‘Sacro GRA’ Highlights the Open Roads Film Festival
headline.main: Encircling Rome, On and Off the Road
